Literature.Title: Beta-sheet pore-forming peptides selected from a rational combinatorial library: mechanism of pore formation in lipid vesicles and activity in biological membranes.
Literature.Author: Rausch JM, Marks JR, Rathinakumar R, Wimley WC

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:5% Hemolysis=15 µM,Sheep erythrocytes:45% Hemolysis=15 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli NapIV(MSC=0.5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MSC=0.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus FDA 209(MSC=1µM),Cryptococcus neoformans 184-A(MSC=4.5±0.9µM)
